member.name: P:CrystalMpq.Utility.LanguagePack.DatabaseFieldIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the localized database field.
member.remarks: In first versions of World of Warcraft, the client databases contained special localized strings spanning multiple fields. One index was assigned to each of the supported cultures, allowing to fetch the localized string. Usually, all localization fields were blank excepted for the one corresponding to the language pack culture.
member.value: The index of the localized database field.
